casebody.data:
QUALITY BUILT HOMES INCORPORATED, et al.
v.
TOWN OF CARTHAGE 315PA15-2 Supreme Court of North Carolina. May 15, 2017 James E. Scarbrough, Attorney at Law, James R. DeMay, Attorney at Law, Concord, John F. Scarborough, Attorney at Law, for Quality Built Homes Incorporated, et al. Susan K. Burkhart, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Town of Carthage. Stephen D. Feldman, Attorney at Law, Paul M. Cox, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, Steven A. Scoggan, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, F. Paul Calamita, III, Attorney at Law, for N.C. Water Quality Association and Seven Municipalities.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 11th of May 2017 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 15th of May 2017."

Defendant shall have up to and including the 21st day of June 2017 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
